Reference

All functions

add_alpha()

Add transparency to a named color

align_events()

Aligns data by events

analyse_modobs2()

Analyse modelled values versus observed data.

calc_patm()

Calculates atmospheric pressure

calc_vp()

Calculate vapor pressure from relative humidity

calc_vp_inst()

Instantaneous vapour pressure

calc_vpd()

Calculate vapour pressure deficit from relative humidity

calc_vpd_inst()

Calculate instantenous VPD from ambient conditions

collect_drivers_sofun()

Collect all drivers

df_to_grid()

Converts a data frame to a a grid

extract_nc()

Extracts point data from a raster file

gc_era5_request()

Download drivers from ECMWF

gc_rsofun_driver_era5()

Format an ERA5 based rsofun driver

get_consecutive()

Identify events

nc_to_df()

NetCDF to data frame

plot_map4()

Plot a nice map with ggplot.

plot_map_simpl()

Empty global map

prepare_setup_sofun()

Complements the setup settings

read_nc_onefile()

Reads a NetCDF file

regrid_df()

Tabular data regridding

write_nc2()

Write array to a NetCDF file
